data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Northern Territory, Australia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern Territory, Australia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Northern Territory, Australia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Northern Territory, Australia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, let those from the 29,855 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 29,855 believers in Northern Territory to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Northern Territory
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Northern Territory, Australia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Northern Territory, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

location.name: Northern Territory
location.cities_list: Darwin, Alice Springs, Palmerston, Howard Springs, Karama
location.cities_list_w_pop: Darwin (129,062), Alice Springs (25,186), Palmerston (25,000), Howard Springs (6,852), Karama (4,894)
